en.name: Ismael
en.msg: I am passionate about technology, I like to learn things that have relevance with web development, databases, networks, programming. Being subjects that I like the learning curve is very fast. A sport that I am as passionate about as technology is TaeKownDo, I have the degree of Black Belt 1st Dan, I continue practicing the sport and I also practice teaching it.
